function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Urban water bodies and wetlands providing habitats for mosquitoes","Impact":"Potential spread of serious infectious diseases by mosquitoes, affecting humans, pets, and wildlife","Mitigation":"Implementing mosquito control measures and reducing stagnant water in urban areas","Technologies":"Mosquito traps, larvicide treatment, and drainage systems","People":"Humans, pets, wildlife","Owner":"Local government, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"High mosquito densities in constructed wet environments","Impact":"Increased risk of mosquito-borne diseases and nuisance factor for humans","Mitigation":"Implementing mosquito control measures and monitoring larval populations","Technologies":"Larvicide treatment, biocontrol methods, and habitat modification","People":"Humans","Owner":"Property developers, environmental agencies"}]}
